original_title: Just King Things Goes To The Shining Opera
overview: Just King Things went to Opera Colorado during the spring of 2022 to watch Moravec and Campbellâ€™s opera adaptation of The Shining. This is a document of that experience.  JUST KING THINGS is a podcast where CMRN and Michael read and talk about the books of Stephen King in publication order.
